channel.title: Projects on Portfolio website for Alex Pracht
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Portfolio website for Alex Pracht

item.title: Weather Anomalies
item.description: Not everyone understands that the world is heating up… knitr::include_graphics("/img/twitter_trump.jpg", error = FALSE) But we will see in the following analysis that there is a trend of global warming… Climate change and temperature anomalies If we wanted to study climate change, we can find data on the Combined Land-Surface Air and Sea-Surface Water Temperature Anomalies in the Northern Hemisphere at NASA’s Goddard Institute for Space Studies. The tabular data of temperature anomalies can be found here

item.title: General Social Survey
item.description: General Social Survey (GSS) The General Social Survey (GSS) gathers data on American society in order to monitor and explain trends in attitudes, behaviours, and attributes. Many trends have been tracked for decades, so one can see the evolution of attitudes, etc in American Society. In this assignment we analyze data from the 2016 GSS sample data, using it to estimate values of population parameters of interest about US adults.

item.title: FlightMap
item.description: On this page I would like to analyse the current flight schedule of Lufthansa Cargo. I downloaded the data directly from the Lufthansa Cargo Website. I wanted to check my hypothesis that Lufthansa Cargo offers few flights right now, but will expand their flight schedule from November on. For visualisation I looked at the following webpage. However some of the functions on this page are already outdated. library(ggplot2) library(maps) library(rgeos) ## Loading required package: sp ## rgeos version: 0.

item.title: Yield Curve Inversion
item.description: What Yiel Curves Can Predict… Yield curves of US treasuries show the different yields for different maturity dates. We looked at US data and used the FRED database. Although we have the yields for maturities between 3 months and 30 years, we would like to focus on only two of them: 1. 3-Month Treasury Bill 2. 10-Year Treasury Rate # Get a list of FRED codes for US rates and US yield curve; choose monthly frequency # to see, eg.
